name: Web or Dead (itch)
description:
Be a spider battling to survive in this challenging platformer. Swing, leap and glide as you race to stay ahead of the rising lava but take care, there are many perils waiting in the deep!

Purchase includes both a stand-alone, non-Steam app and a Steam Key (I will send the key to the email address associated with the purchase).

Do Whatever a Spider Does

  • Walk up walls and on the ceiling to explore the caverns and discover secrets areas
  • Swing from web to web, ascending and descending with perfect timing to beat the challenges ahead
  • Glide like a... spider, ride wind currents to soar across lakes of fire

Beat Challenges

  • Race the clock in Speedrun Mode to unlock 18 Accessories and 6 Additional Playable Spiders with different strengths and weaknesses
  • Compete with your friends or the world with Steam Leaderboards
  • Never let the fun end in Endless Mode - Flappy Spider, anyone?

And if that’s not enough

  • Tap your eight feet to the Original Sound Track
  • Full controller support and ability to remap keys
  • Supports Windows and Linux
